intro.p: Query trophies from the Football API.

Important: The trophies endpoint only supports filtering by player ID or coach ID, not by team. To get trophies for a specific player or coach, you need to first use the Players or Coaches node to get their ID, then manually configure this node with that ID.
Current limitation: This node returns all available trophies without filtering. Use KNIME filtering nodes to narrow down results.
